page.title: 18Thatching
page.content: Mr. Hart is a local thatcher.He lives in Fleet but he does a lot of thatching around the Tadley area. To be a thatcher you must know that there are three different types of thatching material.The first is {Long Straw}which lasts for 20 years and costs Â£3500-Â£4000.Second is{(Devon {Combed) Wheat Reed}which lasts for 40 years and costs Â£5000-Â£6000.The last type is{Norfolk}or{Water Reed}which lasts for 70 years and costs Â£7000- Â£8000.{Norfolk Reed}is very strong and is ideal for thatching. The tools used for thatching are:- a{legget,}a{reeding pin,}a{mallet,}a {side rake ,}a{Bill hook,}a{twister,} and a{pattern block knife. { }Mr.Hart's trademark is a heart. Most thatchers have a{stack {decoration}which they print on every roof they thatch.One is an owl.
